name: Zesty Coconut Macaroons with Cranberries and Pistachios for Kristy's Cookie Party. Glutenfree Vegan Recipe
description: These Coconut Macaroons are super easy, have Orange Zest, cranberries and pistachios. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoons orange marmalade (or orange zest and 2 Tablespoons agave/maple)
2 Tablespoons ground raw sugar (or sweetener of choice)
1/4 cup brown rice flour (or other flour of choice. I usually use spelt if not making gf)
1/4 cup each or more of cranberries and chopped pistachios

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix all the wet ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix all the wet ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the dry and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the dry and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: (If the dough is very wet and squishy after chilling, add a bit more dry ingredients -coconut flakes and flour to make it into a slightly stiff but not dry dough)
recipeInstructions.name: (If the dough is very wet and squishy after chilling, add a bit more dry ingredients -coconut flakes and flour to make it into a slightly stiff but not dry dough)

recipeInstructions.text: Using a scoop or Tablespoon measure, scoop out the mixture. Scoop it out so it gets tightly packed. Or press with your fingers before placing on parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a scoop or Tablespoon measure, scoop out the mixture. Scoop it out so it gets tightly packed. Or press with your fingers before placing on parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: Invert the scoop and tap to place on parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Invert the scoop and tap to place on parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip the scoop in water before every scoop for less mess. or grease with oil after every 2-3 scoops.
recipeInstructions.name: Dip the scoop in water before every scoop for less mess. or grease with oil after every 2-3 scoops.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 14-16 minutes depending on the size of the scoop until slightly golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 14-16 minutes depending on the size of the scoop until slightly golden.

recipeInstructions.text: They burn very easily, so keep an eye after 14 minutes. Turn the sheet around at 14 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: They burn very easily, so keep an eye after 14 minutes. Turn the sheet around at 14 minutes.
